game.name: Cute Farmer Life
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cute Farmer Life is a small indie farm game. Grow, craft and collect resources in a game designed to relax and enjoy the moment. Discover the secrets of the small town you have moved to.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cute Farmer Life is a small indie farm game. Grow, craft and collect resources in a game designed to relax and enjoy the moment. Discover the secrets of the small town you have moved to.

reviewHighlights.text: a very sarcastic bird tells you that you are useless and you should do stuff, and then it turns out the bird is jessus
